00035 #define ATTR_READ_ONLY  0x01
00036 #define ATTR_HIDDEN  0x02
00037 #define ATTR_SYSTEM     0x04
00038 #define ATTR_VOLUME_ID  0x08
00039 #define ATTR_DIRECTORY  0x10
00040 #define ATTR_ARCHIVE 0x20
00041 #define ATTR_LONG_NAME  (ATTR_READ_ONLY | ATTR_HIDDEN | ATTR_SYSTEM | \
00042         ATTR_VOLUME_ID)
00043 #define ATTR_LONG_NAME_MASK     (ATTR_LONG_NAME | ATTR_DIRECTORY | ATTR_ARCHIVE)
